verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he who considers <S%H7919><s%> the poor. <S%H1800><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H4422><s%> him in the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil. <S%H7451><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will preserve <S%H8104><s%> him, <S%H2421><s%> and keep him alive. He shall be blessed <S%H833><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and he will not surrender <S%H5414><s%> him to the will <S%H5315><s%> of his enemies. <S%H341><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will sustain <S%H5582><s%> him on his sickbed, <S%H6210><s%> <S%H1741><s%> and restore <S%H2015><s%> him from his bed <S%H6210><s%> of illness. <S%H2483><s%>
I said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me! <S%H7495><s%> Heal me, <S%H5315><s%> for I have sinned against you. <S%H2398><s%>"
My enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against me: <S%H4191><s%> "When will he die, and his name <S%H8034><s%> perish? <S%H6><s%>"

If he comes <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> me, <S%H1696><s%> he speaks falsehood. <S%H7723><s%> His heart <S%H3820><s%> gathers <S%H6908><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> to itself. <S%H3318><s%> When he goes abroad, <S%H2351><s%> he tells it. <S%H1696><s%>
All who hate <S%H8130><s%> me whisper <S%H3907><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me. <S%H2803><s%> They imagine the worst for me. <S%H7451><s%>
"An evil <S%H1100><s%> disease, <S%H1697><s%>" they say, <S%H3332><s%> "has afflicted him. <S%H7901><s%> Now that he lies he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> no more. <S%H3254><s%>"

Yes, <S%H7965><s%> my own familiar friend, <S%H376><s%> in whom I trusted, <S%H982><s%> who ate <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with me, <S%H1431><s%> has lifted up his heel against me. <S%H6119><s%>
But you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H6965><s%> and raise me up, that I may repay them. <S%H7999><s%>
By this I know <S%H3045><s%> that you delight <S%H2654><s%> in me, <S%H341><s%> because my enemy doesn't <S%H7321><s%> triumph over me.
As for me, <S%H8551><s%> you uphold me in my integrity, <S%H8537><s%> and set <S%H5324><s%> me in your presence <S%H6440><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> and to everlasting! <S%H5769><s%> Amen <S%H543><s%> and amen. <S%H543><s%>
